metamodel.description:
Check this to generate class models on leading frameworks.
This Class Metamodel allows to model Application Object structure and persistence.
SIDE provides the modeler to graphically produce class models and various generators to instantiate these models on leading frameworks.
metamodel.name: KSR500 Data

technology.description: Generate documentation (in opendocument) for the models of the metamodel.
technology.name: OpenDocument

option.documentation: if enabled generator add model screenShoot
option.label: includes screen shoots
